analysis.description: TCCP.isContract (/unique_contracts/0xce9d841d5dbfb0aec57752b4753d70c9c6329f86.sol#72-80) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xce9d841d5dbfb0aec57752b4753d70c9c6329f86.sol:
